content.raw:
The plan right now is:

1. Leak is always on the same wall, but on a randomized position
1. Randomize the table location
1. Randomize the tools locations
1. The finish box will always be at the same location
1. There will be other objects inside the habitat at random locations
1. Randomize the friction on the door valve and hinge

We will only be sure of all this once the pull requests are reviewed and merged though.
content.html:
The plan right now is:

  1. Leak is always on the same wall, but on a randomized position
  2. Randomize the table location
  3. Randomize the tools locations
  4. The finish box will always be at the same location
  5. There will be other objects inside the habitat at random locations
  6. Randomize the friction on the door valve and hinge

We will only be sure of all this once the pull requests are reviewed and merged though.
